title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 16 - Field Audit
content:

§ 16.5 - Exchange of surplus farm products
§ 16.6 - Stores records
§ 16.7 - Cafeterias and commissaries

§ 16.12 - Monthly reconciliation of bank account

§ 16.16 - Evidence of receipt of goods
§ 16.17 - Property records
§ 16.18 - Payroll and time records

Notes

R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 16

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, §
8[14]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
